translations: [有化] 对苯二酚；[有化] 氢醌

sentences.sentence: One of the most dangerous is hydroquinone.
sentences.translation: 其中一个最危险的是对苯二酚。

sentences.sentence: Hydroquinone has been banned in several countries.
sentences.translation: 一些国家已经禁用对苯二酚。

sentences.sentence: Alternatively, it can be combined with small concentrations of hydroquinone.
sentences.translation: 另外，可以结合小浓度的对苯二酚。
